mapper.select: select Auto_increment from information_schema.`TABLES` where Table_Schema='xiaozedb' and table_name = 'tb_item';

select
from tb_item order by auto_id desc LIMIT 1

from tb_item order by auto_id

mapper.update:
update tb_item
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_start_date = #{itemStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
item_deadline = #{itemDeadline,jdbcType=DATE},
item_principal = #{itemPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where auto_id = #{autoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
